name: Dream of Darkness
description:
Dream of Darkness is a story driven game which explores how lovecraftian horror can be found in a story about Spanish sailors that explore the city owned by the Aztecs: Tenochtitlán. Through this journey, they’ll find many obstacles and fears that will test them to death. This part it’s just a prototype that pretends to show a little part of the story, concept art and the mechanic of the game.

It might change and the final version will not be like this one. We hope you enjoy and if you have any comment, please let us know.
